title: Room in a lovely terraced home
description: A lovely and peaceful space surrounded by greenery. It has a fantastic central location close to the Pune - Airport (7 Kms), Railway & Bus Station (3.5 Kms). Our place is great for couples, solo travellers, business travellers, interns, meditators and students of yoga and ayurveda. A warm and welcoming space in a great neighbourhood in close proximity to osho international, parks, art, culture, restaurants etc. The space It is a cozy & beautiful 6 bedroom, house with a huge terrace. All rooms are self contained and private. Guest access Guests can feel free to access the kitchen, living room, a beautiful terrace with many plants, refrigerator, washing machine, wi-fi internet access available in the living room. Basically you can access the entire property with the exception of our private rooms and other guest rooms. Our balcony / terrace is an amazing place to sit in the mornings or evenings and just enjoy the weather. During your stay Would love to interact with guests and support them for whatever they might need to make their stay comfortable and memorable. Interaction totally depends on the guest. If you would like silence and space that is perfectly great as well. Other things to note A few points I would like to share which maybe helpful for you to know. - We have a duplex flat with the entrance and terrace garden on the 3rd floor and private rooms on the 2nd floor. The pictures of the terrace you see in the profile are from the 3rd floor. The terrace is a common area. Your private room is on the second floor. - Access to the rooms is only through the flat and every time one needs to access or leave the room one will have to climb or descend a flight of 15 steps. - We have a pet dog, Ommi, who is very loving and peaceful. He has now become a senior dog at 14 years old, he tends to bark a bit more as he is not able to see that well anymore. But if you just stand still and allow him to sniff you, he will lose interest and become calm again. We also have a pet cat Shanti who is always around too. If you are not comfortable with pets and animals in general, you might want to consider if this is the right place for you to stay. If you are an animal lover you will feel right at home. - We are located on North Main road, Koregaon Park. It is quite a busy road. Even though the rooms are not directly road facing some road noise does come through. This is not so much of a problem but incase anyone is a light sleeper it may be an issue. - it is a non AC room. The room tends to remain cool as it is on the 2 nd floor and does not get direct sunlight for more than a few hours a day. - Check in time is after 1 pm and check out time is by 11 am. - We will need id and address proof soft copies from all guests coming to stay. This can be shared via this same chat after booking and before arrival. - The kitchen is only one for the whole house. For guests it is only available for light cooking of snacks reheating of food and making tea and coffee. - We only allow registered guests to stay. No other visitors are allowed.

title: Casa Wander-1BHK-Baner-Pashan
description: Just 3 kms to Balewadi High Street. 800 mtrs to Mumbai-Bangalore Highway. Welcome to Casa Wander, Your home in Pune - centrally located in Baner-Pashan. This isn‚Äôt just a spacious Luxe 1 BHK apartment, it‚Äôs a home I've crafted for you, my fellow traveler, with a whole lot of love. The space Located in the heart of Baner-Pashan, with top corporate offices, great cafes, and essential services just minutes away, you‚Äôll have everything you need within reach. It‚Äôs close to Pune‚Äôs major corporate hubs, yet far enough to give you that much-needed breather after a long day. A Home for the Business Nomad - For those of you traveling for work, Casa Wander is more than just a convenient spot - it‚Äôs your perfect long-stay home in Pune. I invite you to Casa Wander to embrace a work-life balance that‚Äôs often hard to find on business trips. Start your mornings with a short walk through the peaceful Baner Hill's trails nearby, soaking in the fresh air. Retire your evenings watching the sun melt into the hills, painting the orange sky in fiery hues. It‚Äôs a daily reminder that life is about finding beauty in the in-between moments. You know that feeling when you stumble upon a place that just feels right? Like it‚Äôs been waiting for you all along? That‚Äôs what I‚Äôve tried to create here... a space that‚Äôs not just about staying but about living. Here, the walls whisper stories of wanderlust... of me, of you, of many of your and my co-travellers! Imagine this... your workday begins with sunlight streaming through French windows as you sip your coffee at the work-desk, perfectly placed to inspire both productivity and calm during the day... ... followed by a short drive to the buzzing Balewadi High Street for some nightlife and great food. Business travellers, Families, Solo travellers, or Couples travelling together to create some cherishable memories, You are home at Casa Wander... I‚Äôve thought of everything you might need to feel at ease during your short or long stay: A fully-equipped kitchenette, complete with cookware, cutlery, an induction stove, microwave, earthen crockery, an electric kettle, and a water purifier, so you can also cook meals that feel like home. High-speed Wi-Fi and a comfortable work setup for those virtual meetings or focus hours. A cosy queen-sized bed and a queen lounger-cum-Sofa Bed to help you recharge for the next day. Books, games, and journaling prompts to inspire creativity when you need a break from the grind. Greenery and natural light, because every home - and heart - needs a touch of nature. Here, Work Meets Wanderlust... The cosy corners urge you to dream of faraway places, and the little details like travel-inspired decor and soft, welcoming hues remind you to slow down and savour the ride. You‚Äôre not just staying productive - you‚Äôre finding a balance. This space is designed to remind you that life isn‚Äôt all about work... It‚Äôs about living, pausing, and soaking in the moments that matter. Every corner of Casa Wander is filled with pieces I‚Äôve picked up or crafted with my own hands reliving my travel memories, each with its own story, waiting to become part of yours. The peaceful views of the forested hills and open skies are a gentle nudge to take a break and breathe. So come, and experience Casa Wander where you find yourself inspired, balanced, and recharged... where work doesn‚Äôt just happen - it flows. Now, pack your bags, bring your stories, and let‚Äôs create a chapter of wander and wonder together. Casa Wander is ready to welcome you home. Can‚Äôt wait to host you! Warmly, Simply Vinita :) Guest access Sit & read in our communal seating lounge or catch mesmerizing sunsets from our rooftop terrace, the perfect spots to relax and connect with fellow-travelers. Other things to note Casa Wander is a spacious 1 BHK apartment with a queen bed and a queen sofa-bed. 1. Gated Community 2. Convenient door-step delivery services from Swiggy, Instamart, Zomato, etc. 3. Tea, Coffee - Ready Open kitchenette. 4. Couple-Friendly. We welcome couples if you both are 21+ years. 5. Please note that we need you to share images of Photo ID & Address proofs (Aadhar card/Driving License - front and back both) for all the guests before your check-in. 6. We provide only handwash in the washroom and no other toiletries due to guests‚Äô individual preferences. Request you to carry your own. 7. NO SMOKING, NO DRINKING, NO LOUD MUSIC AFTER 9 PM. NO PARTIES/EVRNTS OR ANY DECORATION Any violation will attract penalties. Thank You. Keep Smiling :)

title: Riverside Haven |Private Terrace & Stunning Views
description: Welcome to your perfect getaway in Koregaon park, Pune! This cozy one-bedroom apartment offers breathtaking river views from the bedroom, hall, and private terrace. Thoughtfully designed with white-themed interiors, warm lighting, and stylish IKEA furnishings, this space is an extension of our hospitality as a Superhost. The interiors feature elegant white furniture, soft ambient lighting, and hand-painted murals, making it an inviting space for relaxation. Living Space: ‚Ä¢ As you enter, you‚Äôll find a comfortable hall area with an IKEA daybed that expands into a queen-sized bed, allowing two guests to sleep comfortably. ‚Ä¢ The hall opens to a private terrace with direct access via an indoor staircase, offering panoramic river views, a covered seating area, and a private shower and washroom‚Äîperfect for unwinding under the open sky. Kitchen & Dining: ‚Ä¢ A fully functional kitchen with all essentials, including an induction stove, oven, kettle-cooker/steamer. ‚Ä¢ Complete set of utensils, plates, cutlery, and glasses for a hassle-free cooking experience. ‚Ä¢ A small dining area with a cozy two-seater sofa, a table, and two chairs for intimate meals. Bedroom: ‚Ä¢ A king-sized IKEA bed with a spring mattress ensures a restful sleep ‚Ä¢ A white cupboard with handles for ample storage. ‚Ä¢ A study table for work or reading. ‚Ä¢ Hand-painted murals by friends, adding a personal artistic touch. ‚Ä¢ Large windows offering a beautiful river view, allowing natural light to fill the room. Bathroom & Utility Area: ‚Ä¢ Located just beside the bedroom, featuring a commode and a water heater for hot showers. ‚Ä¢ The utility area is connected to the kitchen for added convenience. Private errace with a View: ‚Ä¢ A completely covered plywood terrace with an exclusive entrance from the hall. ‚Ä¢ A private shower and washroom, ideal for enjoying a refreshing bath with nature. ‚Ä¢ Unobstructed river views that make for a breathtaking experience, whether you‚Äôre enjoying a cup of coffee or unwinding in the evening. Guest access The whole apartment is privately available to the guests. No unauthorised guests are allowed to stay/visit without prior approval of the host. The exterior security cameras records the arrival and departure of all guests coming. Other things to note Additional Features: ‚Ä¢ Soft ambient lighting with lamps in every room. ‚Ä¢ Superhost experience‚Äîa second listing from a highly-rated host in the same building. ‚Ä¢ A peaceful, cozy vibe with a seamless connection between indoor and outdoor spaces. reviews.review_text: Of the six months my wife and I spent in India, more than half of that time was spent in Tapan's place. Hands down, the best place we stayed at in India. We didn't want to leave, but our Visa ran out, otherwise we'd be in Tapan's place still.

We've now spent more than two months, across multiple stays, in Tapan's place. It has become our home away from home, and despite staying in half a dozen or more other AirBnb homes, this one continues to be our favorite. Nothing bad to say about the place, highly recommend.
The apartment has a very good location in Koregaon Park. The house is renovated, very clean and Mr. Tapan is always very attentive and concerned that everything goes well.
Very Good

We've stayed at Tapan's place for 20 days. Here is the nitty-gritty; a previous guest said the beds were hard. We thought it was just fine. We've seen eight bathrooms thus far and Tapan's was by far the nicest and includes the best squeegee of them all. üòÅ The second floor location offers opportunities for birding from all of the windows which is really nice while washing dishes. The kids play all hours of the day, sometimes quite late but it's a nice family oriented neighborhood. And if you like to walk in nature, you should investigate Poonawalla Circle (Lanes 3 and 4) just around the corner, it's like walking through Banyan tree forest.

We have stayed a a few other places in Pune during our exploration of India. Tapan's place, is by far, the cleanest, classiest and comfortable of them all and the location is wonderful. In fact, we cut short a two week stay at another flat in KP to come back to his place while we take care of our business in Pune.

title: The Vibe - By Sapphire Holiday Homes
description: This stylish place to stay is perfect for travelers, business visitors, group trips, workations, tourists. The Vibe offers good homely stay for travelers no matter whether you are in Pune for a single night or for a weeklong trip. Its a minute away from chandani chowk, which makes it accessible from both major highways Mumbai-Kolhapur-Banglore and Pune-Mulshi-Konkan. Guest access Living and dining area Kitchen Utility area Terrace Bedroom 1 + attached toilet Bedroom 2 + attached toilet Other things to note Please Note: The maid comes around 1 pm for cleaning and watering plants. Sunday she takes off. In case you are getting utensils washed from her pls pay her Additional Charges per day or before checkout. Please be aware that we do not have covered parking available. There is a common parking area in front of the building for your convenience, but please use it at your own risk. Help us conserve energy! Please switch off AC, lights, and fans when not in use. Other Notes: Please note that this is a self-catered home. We do not provide items such as toilet paper, detergent, groceries, or packaged drinking water. We have an Aquaguard for water purification; however, if it is not functioning due to drinking water supply issues, please arrange for your own drinking water. - we are available on msg only. incase of emergency you can reach us on the same number for calling. - It is mandatory to specify the number of guests checking in, including children. Additional guest charges will apply. - Please ensure payment for extra guests is made prior to check-in. - Parties and late-night celebrations are not permitted. - Loud music is prohibited. - Visitors are strictly not allowed during your stay. - Illegal activities, including carrying or consuming drugs/narcotics and firearms/weapons, are prohibited on the property. Management reserves the right to report any such activities to local authorities. - Smoking within the rooms is not allowed. - Guests are responsible for the safety of their personal valuables. Management is not liable for any loss, theft, or damage to items. - As required by law, every guest must present government-approved photo ID proof that shows their address. Acceptable forms of ID include Aadhar Cards, Driving Licenses, and Passports. - Inappropriate behavior or violations of the above House Rules may result in a polite refusal to accept a booking. If you have already checked in, management reserves the right to ask guests to leave. - The management is not responsible for accidents / injuries caused by wildlife. Guests must ensure their own safety. - Any damage caused to the property will be charged at the actual cost. Internet & Wi-Fi Notice We offer complimentary internet and Wi-Fi, but availability and reliability may be affected by external factors. Severe weather and service provider issues may cause disruptions. We'll do our best to address any issues promptly. TV with Netflix subscription, 20 Liter mineral water can be provided. Bed linen will be changed twice if you stay for a week. **Important Notice Regarding Internet and Wi-Fi Services** We are pleased to offer complimentary internet and Wi-Fi services at our holiday home to enhance your stay. However, please be aware that the availability and reliability of these services can occasionally be affected by external factors beyond our control. **Potential Disruptions:** 1. **Weather Conditions:** Severe weather, including storms and heavy rainfall, may impact the performance of internet and Wi-Fi services. 2. **Service Provider Issues:** The functionality of our internet and Wi-Fi depends on the service provided by our internet company, which may sometimes experience technical malfunctions or outages. We strive to maintain a stable internet connection for your convenience, but we cannot guarantee uninterrupted service. We appreciate your understanding and patience in these circumstances. Should you encounter any issues with the internet or Wi-Fi during your stay, please do not hesitate to contact us. We will do our best to address the situation promptly. Thank you for your understanding and enjoy your stay! ---

title: Minka: Cozy Japandi Studio for Couples & Travelers
description: Minka is your perfect little retreat, very close to Balewadi High Street and just a km from the Mumbai-Bangalore Highway. We have carefully curated this little space where comfort, style, and tranquility come together. Whether you‚Äôre in town for work, a weekend getaway, or just need a break from the hustle and bustle, Minka is designed to make you feel right at home. The space As you step inside, you‚Äôll be greeted by calming natural light, soft greens, and neutral tones that create a peaceful and serene atmosphere. Every piece of furniture here has been thoughtfully chosen by us, capturing the essence of Japandi style ‚Äî a perfect blend of Japanese simplicity and Scandinavian functionality; blending style and comfort to make your stay extra special. You‚Äôll find that we‚Äôve added personal touches throughout, from the live plants bringing a little bit of nature inside, to the solid wood TV unit crafted from a single tree ‚Äî a true statement piece that reflects the attention to detail we‚Äôve put into this space. We‚Äôve also made sure you feel taken care of with the little things ‚Äî like high-quality toiletries, a cozy nook for reading, and a collection of books to help you unwind. For a bit of fun and nostalgia, you‚Äôll find a retro video game console with classics like Super Mario, Contra or Tank ‚Äî perfect for anyone who grew up in the ‚Äò90s (or simply loves a bit of retro charm). Minka is more than just a space to sleep. It‚Äôs a place where you can relax, recharge, and reconnect. Whether you‚Äôre enjoying the quiet of the surroundings, curling up with a good book, or reminiscing over some childhood video games, you‚Äôll find everything you need here to create your perfect stay. The peaceful atmosphere, combined with high-end details, makes it an ideal home base for couples, solo travelers, or anyone looking for a little escape. High-speed Wi-Fi and a 43‚Äù Smart TV provide the ideal setup for both productivity and relaxation or just to Netflix and Chill. The well-equipped kitchenette invites you to create simple meals, with all the essentials: cookware, crockery, cutlery, an induction cooktop, and a water purifier ‚Äî everything you need to satisfy cravings at any time. Minka‚Äôs minimalist design, with its clean lines, natural materials, and earthy tones, creates a serene atmosphere where you can unwind, reconnect with yourself, and embrace the tranquility of Japandi living.

title: Private room in a 3-bedroom apartment
description: A snug private room in a spacious 3 BHK apt nestled in the evergreen neighbourhood of Koregaon Park. Koregaon park is home to the Osho Ashram and some of the best caf√©s, restaurants, pubs and clubs; most of which can be explored by foot. We‚Äôre all about the location & comfort! Pune Airport & Railway station are both within a 5.5 km radius. This is an animal-friendly building and there are two adorable yet non-intrusive cats that live in the apartment with me. Women and couples allowed only.. The space A snug private room with an en-suite bathroom in a spacious 3 BHK apartment nestled in the heart of the evergreen neighbourhood of Koregaon Park. Other significant amenities include a covered car park, security and a favourable location! Guest access The bedroom is fully equipped with a spacious bathroom, an AC, a cloth rack, a fridge, a kettle and a coffee/tea maker. We provide coffee, tea & cookies on the house during your stay! Guests can use the lounge area, kitchen area and the washing machine for laundry (at an extra cost of R/s 150 per load, detergent provided) The lounge area has a lovely balcony, surrounded by trees; a great spot to read a book or just simply bird watch! During your stay I do travel quite a bit, however if in town, I will be on-premise mostly. I‚Äôm all about peaceful co-existence and flexibility. Happy to provide you with all the information you need to make your stay a memorable one :) Upon arrival, I will provide you with all the information of the neighbourhood with all the places worth visiting, whether you‚Äôre here for a shopping experience, gastronomy experience or a cultural experience, I‚Äôve got your back! Also, every person‚Äôs needs are different. So in case you are familiar with the town already, and just need a quite peaceful place to stay and relax or work, and require minimal interaction, its completely understandable and I‚Äôd be happy to let you be :) In case of late check-in‚Äôs, Govind, our trusted building watchman will be happy to let you in and show you the apartment. Other things to note Please note this is an animal friendly building with pretty much every neighbour being animal lovers. There are two adorable yet non-intrusive cats that live in the apartment with me. Midi and Mango love to snooze in the lounge area however they know not to enter the private room. If you‚Äôre allergic to cats or are not fond of animals, I will have to recommend trying another place. Women and couples are welcome, however due to stringent society rules, no solo male guests are allowed.

The bedroom: It has a queen bed with foam mattress and pillows with head rest along with a bed side table. A cupboard for storage. Study table to work from home. Tv with Tata sky connection (to be added soon) Wi-Fi with 50 mbps speed is available The kitchen: It has an induction cooktop for environmental reasons along with induction compatible pots and pans. It has a Microwave for cooking and heating food along with a Fridge for storage, toaster, blender and kettle. There are basic cutleries available for your use. Wash basin for doing the dishes is also available in the same space. An extra table is also provided to store items along with cleaning products. We have a maid who will come daily for mopping the floor and doing the dishes (unless she falls sick) Her usual timing is between 3-5pm. The washroom: The bathing and bidet areas are separate from each other. Right now we have an Indian toilet (to be upgraded soon) The shower area has storage available along with hot water facilities 24/7. Common washrooms basin area with mirror, soap and toothpaste made available for guests. Patio/Balcony: The balcony is attached to the living room with bean bags and sun loungers to chill. The plants to be watered often cos we care about them. The utility area: The utility area is in the kitchen space with a washing machine and easy dry hanging on the top. The passage to the apartment: Two lifts are available from the ground level to reach the apartment. Parking: We have free uncovered parking to the side of the building to be used by guests. Access to the society: You will need an entry pass to the society which will be provided before your check-in date. It is a 24/7 secured society with common spaces lit up at all times making sure you feel safe and at home. We additional have a home kitchen for Assamese styled food in case you wish to try it. Available for all meals of the day. Details in the photos. Guest access Guests will be able to access all areas inside the apartment. The living room, patio, bedroom, kitchen, washroom. Other things to note Neighbours: They are all families with young kids who might want to peep into your apartment if main door is left unattended/opened. Ideal to keep to oneself. Neighbourhood: Shopping complex - Destination Center 1 about 500 meters walking distance from the security gate. Pharmacy, Vegetable shops, Dmart, Doctors, Salons are also available here. Swiggy/Zomato/Ola/Uber/Blinkit/Zepto/BigBasket/Amazon/Flipkart - Everything gets delivered here. EV two and four wheeler charging is available in the same complex. Ask the security guards to guide you there. There are gyms around the area too in case you wish to access it from time to time. Nanded City Hospital is around 1 kms away in case of emergencies. After 11pm deliveries have to be picked up from the security gate. There is a movie theatre about 3-4 kms from the property called Abhiruchi PVR. This property is at the end of Sinhagad Road in a township called Nanded City. Please check the location before placing a booking. House rules: Please keep the property like your own home. Quiet hours: 10pm to 6am Smoking only in the patio. No visitors (strictly) No parties No photoshoots Please leave the garbage outside the door before 9:30am for housekeeping to collect it. Be kind to the plants. Water them if you can. Allow the maid to clean the place daily.

description: Step into a beautifully renovated 2BHK flat that combines contemporary design with comfort. Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located place in North Main Road, Koregaon Park. My apartment is a renovated space with 2 spacious AC bedrooms, equipped kitchen and living room We provide Wifi, daily housekeeping, Air Conditioner, Smart TV, hot water are the amenities provided in my apartment. The space Step into a beautifully renovated 2BHK flat that combines contemporary design with comfort. Every corner of this home has been thoughtfully crafted to create a spacious and welcoming environment. Both bedrooms are spacious, with ample storage and modern fixtures. The master bedroom boasts a private, cozy retreat with built-in wardrobes and high-end fittings. The second bedroom offers flexibility, ideal as a guest room or home office. With its prime location, this newly renovated flat offers a perfect blend of luxury, convenience, and functionality‚Äîideal for families, young professionals, or anyone looking to enjoy modern living in India. My space comprises of modern interiors, two spacious bedrooms, kitchen, two bathrooms, dedicated workspace, free parking, fast Wifi, Smart tv located in Koregaon Park. My Space: 1. Ideal for working from Home. 2. Centrally located next to all transportation 3. Fresh Linens including fresh Towel, Bedsheets, Hand towel, Toiletries ( shampoo, shower gel) are provided. 4. Local market with groceries, fresh fruits & vegetables is available just outside the building ( home delivery is also available ). 5. We have provided induction for cooking along with basic cutlery, crockery and utensils. 6. Daily cleaning service is provided between 10 am to 2pm. 7. Walking distance for the best Caf√©‚Äôs/bars/ tourist places 8. Free Wifi available 9. Smart TV, Air conditioner, Refrigerator, Hot water all are provided. Parking: Once you reach the building, there is a free common parking space located 50 meters before the main entrance of the building. Flat Location: My flat is on the mezzanine floor. The lift only goes to the first and second floors. You‚Äôll need to take the lift to the first floor and then climb a few stairs to reach the mezzanine floor, as the lift does not stop on this level. Identifying the Flat: Look for the name "Sapphire" on the main door of the apartment. Smart Lock Access: The main door is equipped with a smart lock. The code for the lock will be shared with you on the booking date. Booking Confirmation: Once your booking is confirmed, please send ID proofs for all guests. After verification, you will receive a confirmation message along with the address details. Please read all the house rules carefully before proceeding with the booking. Guest access It is a private 2BHK apartment. Guest has access to entire flat. Other things to note As home is a part of a society, all society rules and regulations needs to be followed by my guests. Check-in time is 2pm or later and checkout time is 11am. Please read & agree to the house rules before booking: WE DO NOT ALLOW ANY GUESTS WHO HAS LOCAL ID PROOF ( PUNE CITY) IF YOU BOOK WITHOUT READING THIS HOUSE RULE WE WILL DENY THE REQUEST. 1. Guest has to provide a photo of identity proof (PAN CARD NOT VALID) with address mentioned on it upon checkin or email id provided by the host before checking in the apartment/farmhouse/bungalow. 2. The management has a strict no visiting guest policy at our apartment. 3. The management is not responsible for any loss of belongings of the guests. 4. All necessary cutlery and crockery are kept in the kitchen cabinet. 5. No smoking indoors and strictly no drugs. 6. Turn off lights, fans; close the taps when not in use. 7. Keep volumes low so that others in the vicinity have a peaceful stay too. 8. Please close all windows and doors when you leave the property. 9. Promptly let your host know if anything can be done to make your stay better. 10. If a guest brings more than the max occupancy as mentioned in the listing, then they have to pay for the extra guest as applicable. 11. If you damage something, please let us know & arrange for its replacement/repair. 12. Kindly clear all the dues before check-out. 13. Leave our home neat & tidy. 14. Management reserves right for admission. 15. You do not need to wash any crockery or cutlery after using them as my housekeeping maid will clean them daily between 10am and 2pm. 16. Use of candles and any decoration material is strictly prohibited.

title: Breathe Luxe Riverfront-Golf Course View Apartment
description: Step into a world of serenity as you open the door to "Breathe." This thoughtfully designed luxurious one bedroom apartment in a 40-acre golf property is a sanctuary amidst the bustling city life, offering you a peaceful retreat to relax, unwind, and recharge. Located near Mumbai ‚Äì Pune expressway, makes this property perfect for a quick visit to Pune city or just have a weekend getaway. The apartment offers panoramic views of the golf course, river, and mountain range. The space The house is tastefully decorated overlooking the Pawna River, on the 12th floor with a private terrace. At the entrance of the house, you will find shoe rack outside and foyer area inside to keep your basic items. Next to it you will find utility area with fully automatic washing machine and cloth drying rack, iron with iron table, extra quilt, and bedsheet. The fully equipped kitchen provides all the amenities you need to whip up a delicious meal, with modern appliances like fridge, microwave, toaster, sandwich maker, kettle, coffee maker, 2 burners auto ignited gas stove and necessary cookware, serveware. Next to it is a stylish dining area with highchairs for those enjoyable home-cooked dinners or morning coffee moments. The living area is filled with natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere is equipped with a 42-inch full HD smart TV with a sofa cum bed in front of it which opens to become a king size bed. For relaxation and entertainment there are some selected books and a guitar kept for the music lovers or just to pose with and have a memorable click. Retreat to the cozy bedroom, where you'll find a comfortable king-sized bed and soft, luxurious linens. Dressing cum study unit and large spacious wardrobe. Bathroom is well equipped with shower and necessities like shampoo, body wash and towels. The house also comes with garden furniture to enjoy your mornings on private terrace with cup of tea or coffee or just relax and enjoy the beautiful open view and Pune rains. Guest access SWIMMING POOL AT THE MAIN CLUB HOUSE IS CLOSED DUE TO MAINTAINCE TILL MARCH 31st 2025. Guests will have exclusive access to the entire apartment. The complex has a 9 hole golf course for which paid access is available. Golf kits and caddies are also available from Pro-shop. Beginners can avail of coaching from certified in-house coach on driving range or practice greens or the upcoming golf simulator. The complex has well-maintained beautiful walking paths, Boating facilities, Horse riding facilities, fishing area, benches and gazebos to enjoy your me time. title: Relaxing Refuge @ the Luxe Abode
description: The relaxing refuge offers you a calm, stylish space to unwind & take some time off. The home boasts a crisp, elegant decor while still feeling comfortable & inviting. Soak in the morning rays on the sunlit balcony as you admire the golf course view. Enjoy a nature walk/run, a bike ride or a game of golf. At sunset, watch the sky turn pink as you immerse yourself in the tranquil beauty of your surroundings. Looking to work from home? You'll have a dedicated work space and high-speed wifi. The space If this home is unavailable for your dates, or if you are a larger group, please consider our identical twin home next door: Cosy Golf View Retreat @ The Luxe Abode. Our home has all the necessary modern amenities, an open-plan kitchen and living area, and one bedroom with an en suite bathroom. The apartment can comfortably accommodate up to four people with an easy-to-use sofa bed. Inside the kitchen, you'll find everything you need to cook a meal. The living room has a Wi-Fi-connected flat-screen smart TV. You'll also have access to a washer, drying rack, iron and ironing board, towels, toiletries, a hair dryer, and more. The apartment is located in a golf complex. Guest access Guests will have exclusive access to the entire apartment. The complex has well-maintained, beautiful walking paths dotted with benches (accessible to guests) to take in the lush, tranquil surroundings. The complex has a 9-hole golf course for which paid access is available. Golf kits and caddies are also available for hire. Beginners can avail of coaching with the in-house coach. The golf course is closed on Tuesdays and certain designated holidays. Other things to note In an effort to maintain secure premises, the apartment is equipped with one exterior camera. The camera is only on the exterior. There are no cameras on the inside. Restaurant deliveries are available through Zomato. Deliveries can also be availed of from the clubhouse cafe. There are a number of homemakers within the complex offering home-cooked meals. Other delivery services functional in the area include Amazon, Flipkart, Dmart, and BigBasket. Ola and Uber are easy ways to get to the city and neighbouring areas. Our housekeeping staff is available between 10-11 a.m. and 2-3 p.m. for daily housekeeping services.

title: Casa Enchante - a Luxe Studio Apt at Baner Pashan
description: Just 3 kms to Balewadi High Street. 800 mtrs to Mumbai-Bangalore Highway. Welcome to Casa Enchante - a spacious luxe studio apartment centrally located in Baner-Pashan. It is infused with love, artistry, and a touch of magic - a space I‚Äôve lovingly curated for you. It is where city energy meets soulful vibes, just minutes from corporate hubs and vibrant caf√©s, yet a world away from the rush. Here, you return not just to a home, but to a feeling - one of calm, comfort, and quiet luxury. The space The moment you walk in, you‚Äôre absorbed by soft mauves, deep purples, elegant rose gold, and serene greys - a palette chosen not just for its beauty but for the energy it brings. - Purple, the color of wisdom and creativity, sets the tone for deep thinking, focus, and inspiration. Whether you're working on a project or simply unwinding, this space supports your mind‚Äôs best work and your soul‚Äôs deepest rest. - Florals woven into the decor reflect growth, beauty, and new beginnings‚Äîa reminder that life is always blossoming, just like your journey. - Rose gold and warm lighting add a touch of luxury, making every moment here feel like a little indulgence because you deserve it. Whether you're here for work, a long stay, or just a break from the usual, Casa Enchante is a form of colour therapy for you, designed to elevate your mood, boost mental clarity, and create a balance between work and relaxation. It is a home infused with blissful love, artistry, and a touch of magic. Designed for the Modern Business Traveler & Long Stays: I know that when you're travelling for work or settling in for an extended stay, comfort and accessibility matter. That‚Äôs why Casa Enchante blends the best of home-like coziness with hotel-like convenience. Here‚Äôs what makes your stay effortless: ‚úîÔ∏è A dedicated sunlit work-desk with a mountain view, perfect for work calls & brainstorming sessions. ‚úîÔ∏è High-speed Wi-Fi & a 43‚Äù Smart TV, so you stay connected when needed and unwind when it‚Äôs time. ‚úîÔ∏è A Dining space with a hint of rose gold for those quiet and healthy meals. ‚úîÔ∏è A fully-equipped kitchenette, with cookware, a microwave, induction, an electric kettle, and a water purifier because sometimes, a home-cooked meal is the best comfort. ‚úîÔ∏è A cozy bed with premium linens, ensuring deep, restful sleep. ‚úîÔ∏è A reading nook filled with inspiring books, art supplies, and journaling prompts, because creativity should always have a seat at the table. ‚úîÔ∏è Greenery and flowers, breathing life and positive energy into every corner. title: Heritage Homestay in Sadashiv Peth- 2BHK Wi-Fi AC
description: Centrally located heritage property. This family heirloom is in the centre of Pune, in Sadashiv Peth with all kinds of markets & co-working spaces nearby. Dagdusheth Ganpati Mandir is a 10 minute ride. Property is on the main road with all transportation options easily accessible. This property has WiFi, Water Filter, Fridge, HD TV, AC in both bedrooms, with double beds, a large dining room, a small kitchen and 1 bathroom. On street car parking available. Welcome to a cozy heritage home! The space Kelkar Wada was built in 1934. This property is an apartment on the first floor. With brick walls, stone floors and sloped roofs, this takes you back in time. The main features are the wooden double door windows and doors. It is a 10 minute ride from Deenanath Mangeshkar Hospital, Sahyadri Hospital, S B Road, Law college road and Dagdusheth Ganpati Mandir. Centrally located with availability of Uber, Ola, Swiggy and Zomato, this apartment is perfect for long and short stays in the city. There are 2 comfortable double bedrooms, one dining room, a kitchen and one washroom. With all the latest amenities like Induction, Kettle, Water Purifier, Fridge, TV with active subscriptions, high speed WiFi and AC in both bedrooms. Guest access The whole property is accessible for guests. You will have access to 2 Bedrooms, both with AC, living room, dining room, washroom, and a balcony. It is a free standing building on the main road - with wooden stairs that take you to the first floor (No lift) Other things to note Please be mindful of the property. This is a heritage property, please be gentle with the furnishings and doors. This is a strictly non smoking property. The property is on a busy street - expect traffic noise. title: Welcome to Sukoon"(‡§∏‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ç‡§® )
description: Welcome to Sukoon"(‡§∏‡•Å‡§ï‡•Ç‡§® ) is Urdu and Arabic expression The meaning of Sukoon is "calm" "peace," or "tranquility." Sukoon is my dream stay which has been Created with a lot of love and warmth beautifully designed to create memories that will be cherished in your hearts forever. Take it easy at this unique space & tranquil getaway. The space In Sukoon‚Ä¶ every little detail has been taken care of right from the comfortable set-up to the special feel of home to the attractive decor specially designed for you with a touch of love. The wall paintings enhance the look, soothing color window blinds keep the house cool and calm, comfort and elegance in the living room & bedroom, the warm lights add to the charm. A bedroom where you can sleep peacefully with the Scenic view of the green Fields. Stylish bathroom where you can pamper yourself. A few of the things people love most about a home is comfort and security. Sukoon has a warm, inviting and a peaceful atmosphere with a touch of elegance where you will feel happy and at peace. A spacious Living room, very aesthetically done where you can enjoy the 65inch smart Television as well as read books with a glass of an exclusive wine. Sukoon is designed luxuriously combining style, comfort and convenience to create a space that looks and feels beautiful while fulfilling all the functions of a home. A bright, modern kitchen where you can cook delicious meals / snacks and at the same time chat with your loved ones while you enjoy the view. Located in a very impressive, serene, scenic area‚Ä¶ you will find Sukoon in a sophisticated tower with an extravagant amount of walking space and high end amenities. A beautiful resort property by Lodha, it‚Äôs very conveniently located surrounded with golf course and a club house with all facilities. The way Sukoon has been created, I can assure you it will become your favourite place that will be close to your heart where you will make beautiful memories and would want to come back again and again‚Ä¶ A blissful home where you can enjoy the sunrise and the sunset, the natural daylight, the cool breeze, the blue sky, immense green fields, the starry nights‚Ä¶ perfect for all days round the year. A home away from home but with a twist that you will love, Sukoon takes pride in welcoming you to a house that reflects my personal style and taste. Guest access SWIMMING POOL AT THE MAIN CLUB HOUSE IS CLOSED DUE TO MAINTAINCE TILL MARCH 31st 2025. Guests will have exclusive access to the entire apartment. The complex has well-maintained beautiful walking paths dotted with benches to take in the lush tranquil surroundings. The complex has a 9 hole golf course for which paid access is available. Golf kits and caddies are also available for hire. Beginners can avail of coaching with the in-house coach. The golf course is closed on Tuesdays and certain designated holidays. The clubhouse is functional from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m. on all days EXCEPT Tuesday and certain designated holidays. Entry to the clubhouse is chargeable per person per day. Club passes are only issued to the apartment owners. Therefore, if you wish to use the clubhouse facilities you will need to inform our local host in advance. Below is a partial list of amenities at the clubhouse: ‚Ä¢ Swimming pools for adults and kids ‚Ä¢ Gym ‚Ä¢ Table tennis, pool table and other indoor games ‚Ä¢ Kids arena (up to 12 years) with rock climbing, Playstation, etc. ‚Ä¢ Steam, sauna, and jacuzzi ‚Ä¢ Tennis court and basketball court ‚Ä¢ 30 yard lush green T20 cricket ground ‚Ä¢ Playground for kids with slides, seesaw, etc. Guests can avail of the following additional facilities located in the clubhouse which are chargeable on actuals: ‚Ä¢ Salon and spa ‚Ä¢ All-day cafe serving vegetarian fare. ‚Ä¢ Multi-cuisine vegetarian restaurant serving lunch and dinner. Other things to note As our valued guest, you'll have the opportunity to avail the following amenities within our property (some on paid basis) , ensuring a memorable and fulfilling experience. 1) Access to 3 swimming pools: Take a refreshing dip in any of our three swimming pools, each offering a unique atmosphere. Whether you prefer a leisurely swim, a fun-filled splash with the family, or a relaxing soak, these pools cater to your preferences. One of the pools is even temperature controlled, providing a comfortable swimming environment year-round. 2) Hot Jacuzzi: Unwind and melt away your stress in the inviting hot Jacuzzi. Immerse yourself in the warm, bubbling waters and let the soothing jets massage your cares away, leaving you feeling rejuvenated. 3) Gym: Stay active and maintain your fitness routine at our fully-equipped gym. With a range of modern exercise equipment, you'll have everything you need for a productive workout session during your stay. 4) Dining options: Indulge in a culinary journey with our on-site dining options. Treat yourself to a fine dining experience at our exquisite restaurant, where skilled chefs craft delectable vegetarian dishes to tantalize your taste buds. Additionally, we have three charming cafes and a cozy bar where you can relax and savor a variety of beverages and light bites. 5) Lake access: Explore the beauty of Pawana Lake with our exclusive access. Engage in fishing or enjoy a peaceful boating excursion, surrounded by serene waters and picturesque landscapes. 6) Recreational activities: Engage in a variety of recreational activities to suit your interests. Enjoy a game of golf on our scenic golf course, showcase your cricket skills on the dedicated ground, test your tennis prowess on the courts, or shoot some hoops on the basketball court. Additionally, our property offers indoor games, a movie hall (prior booking required), a wellness spa and salon. 7) Ganesh temple: Experience a touch of spirituality at the Ganesh temple located within the property. Take a moment to immerse yourself in the peaceful ambiance and seek blessings in this sacred space. With these exceptional amenities at your disposal, your stay with us promises to be an unforgettable and enriching experience. Other things to note 1. Clubhouse facilities are chargeable per person per day, are not available on tuesdays and designated holidays. 2. Swimming pool is a part of the club house, costume is a must to get into the pool. 3. We have many leading restaurants delivering food at the home via ZOMATO. 4. Home is facing the MCA Stadium on the21st floor Having said all of that, we are 30 kms away from the city center but have all modern day apps available for the perfect resort WFH staycation, weekend getaway or just to simply chill.

description: Our home is a luxurious abode built with a lot of love and eye for detail. Every inch is designed with elements that can provide a really soothing experience and get you rejuvenated. The community is a golfer's bliss and has all ultra luxe club amenities like pool, gym, tennis, boating, horse-riding & restaurant bar. The space We made a conscious effort to design a white house which has everything white. From fridge, to kitchen to furniture to sofa to crockery to even the water kettle, we have everything white. The idea is to give you a soothing international experience like Santorini or Mijas in Spain (couple of coastal towns we love ourselves). The home is furnished with a lot of IKEA fittings which has world-class finish, unlike any other Indian furniture. The home comes with a tall unit in the kitchen which has an in-built touchscreen microwave oven. It also has an induction cooktop and a blender for some light healthy cooking. The smart LG Tv comes with our logged in Netflix, Prime Vides, Hotstar accounts. We have quite a few fancy lights to set the mood for evening dinner. title: Casa Zen Spacious Studio Apt Baner-Pashan
description: Balewadi High Street - Just 3.5 kms Mumbai-Bangalore Highway - 800 mtrs Looking for a peaceful home to come back to? Welcome to Casa Zen, a cozy yet spacious Zen-inspired studio apartment, where you‚Äôll find a sense of oneness with nature in every corner. Curated with all my heart and soul, this space reflects my own zen, minimalist lifestyle. Wake up to the soothing sounds of birds and take in stunning forest views through large French windows, like a painting come to life. The space Thoughtfully designed with earthy tones and simple, creative touches, Casa Zen exudes the beauty of minimalism, helping you find peace in simplicity. Here, you‚Äôll experience true meaning of Zen ‚Äî feeling connected to nature, relaxed, and fully at ease. Come, unwind, and feel at home in my serenely happy place. Located just a short drive from major corporate offices, Casa Zen is perfect for business travelers who want to balance work and relaxation. After a productive day, come back to a sanctuary where nature‚Äôs earthy vibes will calm your soul & body. Casa Zen is a spacious studio apartment (single room with an attached washroom and an open kitchenette) comfortably fits up to four guests, making it ideal for solo travelers, small groups, or families. The queen-size bed with earthy-toned bedding ensures you get a restful night‚Äôs sleep, while the cozy sofa-cum-bed and Zen rug invites you to relax and enjoy your favorite shows on the 43" smart TV. Whether you're enjoying your morning coffee from the kitchenette or simply soaking in the peaceful vibes of the Zen corner filled with greenery and soothing water elements, you are sure to feel at home here at Casa Zen. The airy room is bathed in natural light, offering a peaceful zen ambiance. Last Minute Emails? We have your back. The work cum dining table, with a beautiful view of the Baner hills, offers a peaceful spot to focus and stay inspired. With high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the studio, you can stay connected and get things done, all while enjoying the slow pace of life here. When it‚Äôs time to unwind, our Zen Corner is the perfect place to find peace ‚Äî a favorite among our guests. This cozy spot invites you to relax with a book or enjoy some quiet Time while soaking in the serene view of Baner Hills. You may even catch a glimpse of a peacock! To inspire your creativity, we‚Äôve added some art supplies, so if the moment moves you, feel free to create. Zen, after all, is all about finding stillness, mindfulness, and inspiration in the simplest moments. Feeling hungry? Our thoughtfully designed kitchenette has everything you need ‚Äî from an induction stove and electric kettle to a water purifier, earthen crockery, and essential cookware. It‚Äôs all here to make you feel at home, whether you're whipping up a quick breakfast or a special dinner. If you‚Äôre up for an adventure, the nearby trails of Baner and Pashan Hills are perfect for connecting with nature. When you‚Äôre ready to explore the city, you'll find top cafes, cultural spots, and shopping areas just a short drive away. At Casa Zen, we embrace the true essence of Zen ‚Äî a state of calm, mindfulness, and inner peace. It‚Äôs the perfect escape to rest, recharge, and discover a bit of magic within. Whether you‚Äôre visiting for work or leisure, we‚Äôve designed everything to make your stay peaceful, comfortably useful, and truly memorable. Can‚Äôt wait to welcome you to Casa Zen! Guest access Sit & read in our communal seating lounge or catch mesmerizing sunsets from our rooftop terrace, the perfect spots to relax and connect with fellow-travelers. Other things to note Casa Zen Casa Meraki is a spacious studio apartment (single room with large french windows) with a queen bed and a queen sofa-bed. 1. Gated Community 2. Convenient door-step delivery services from Swiggy, Instamart, Zomato, etc. 3. Tea, Coffee - Ready Open kitchenette. 4. Couple-Friendly. We welcome couples if you both are 21+ years. 5. Please note that we need you to share images of Photo ID & Address proofs (Aadhar card/Driving License - front and back both) for all the guests before your check-in. 6. We provide only handwash in the washroom and no other toiletries due to guests‚Äô individual preferences. Request you to carry your own. Thank You. Keep Smiling :)

title: Cosy and Quiet Nook Amidst Greenery
description: Airbnb SUPERHOST welcomes you to our cosy 1 BHK suite with private entrance - Hall, 1 Bedroom, well equipped Kitchen and a modern clean Bath with Parking, TV & WIFI. Quiet leafy residential place near Colleges, IT Park & Shops helps you feel at home. The space Welcome to Ashray B&B, a cosy, quiet and comfortable nook in Pashan, Pune. Ashray B&B is located on the ground floor of our bungalow at Padmalay off Sus Road which offers you a peaceful and homely environment that helps you relax and unwind after a busy day. Our B&B is a private suite of rooms with a separate entrance that you do not share with anybody else! It includes a Hall, Bedroom, well equipped Kitchen and a squeky clean attached Bathroom + Toilet with Parking space, TV, Fridge & WIFI connection. Overall, it is a perfect place to put your feet up and watch your popular soap/game with a glass of your favorite iced drink. This quiet leafy residential place has the following attractions nearby. Pune University, IISER, NCL, ARDE, Flame School of Business- Oxford Golf & Country Club, Symbiosis International University, Lavale, UWC Mahindra College, Mercedes-Benz International School, Fergusson College and Hinjewadi IT Park, Shri Chhatrapati Sports Complex - Balewadi,Yoganjali Yoga (Iyengar yoga), restaurants, theatres and malls nearby. There a excellent low-cost Idli/Wada & Chatni option for breakfast by a person who visits our lane daily around 9 am. We can provide you his contact information when you arrive. In addition, there are a number of breakfast places nearby that you can walk to or order from and have it delivered. For Lunch and Dinner options during the day... There are lots of restaurants close to home if you plan to relax and have a quiet meal or fast food options if you plan to order it in. Our B&B has a list of all the local menu cards to help you decide. Zomato app is also an excellent place to check out these options as well. Since we have a well equipped kitchen with basic items, you could also cook and eat some home cooked food if need be. Grocery stores close to home will deliver items at the doorstep. Regarding laundry facilities, there are a few options including ones where we could have the clothes collected and delivered on a regular basis. The charges for these would need to be paid directly to the service provider. If you are looking for some exercise, the bio-diversity park close to home is an excellent place to go for a morning jog or a trek to get your adrenalin pumped up. There are also a couple of gyms close to home that you could enroll and avail of if that is your preference. We have recently installed a camera system for security purposes that covers the AirBnb outside entrance door as well. If you are interested to know of sightseeing options in and around Pune, please check for placesnearpune on (website hidden). Guest access Guests will have an independent access to Ashray B&B as it has a separate entrance. Other things to note If you are interested in sightseeing or places to Eat in Pune, this is one of the best ways to get information. Check out videos on You Tube called 'Gotta Shop' or 'Gotta Eat' in Pune.

title: Chez Varun & Maitreyee, your vibrant vacation home
description: Our place is located at riverside. It has a vibrant vacation vibe with thematic decor. We let out master bedroom with attached toilet and balcony for airbnb (out of 2Bhk flat) . Very easy access to the Mumbai - Bangalore Highway (500 meters approx.). It is 5-10 minutes walking distance from grocery and general utility stores and food joints. Best suited for families. The place has 2 beautiful balconies. you can watch the sun rise in one and the sun set in another. Pls ensure to read house rules The space The guests will have access to living space, kitchen as shared spaces. They will have complete privacy with master bedroom with attached washroom and balcony. we have a beautiful garden in the attached balcony so allow us/our maid access to water the plants! we use the other bedroom as our music and painting studio. Varun is a musician and practises Sitar every night until about 10.30-11 pm. So welcome if you are a music lover! The kitchen can be used for making tea/coffee and quick meals. We would appreciate that the kitchen space gets cleaned up after use During your stay We do not usually stay at the place. However we are a phone call away for any of your questions. We will try to be there to welcome you most of the times Other things to note Hello, 1. Please ensure to read and follow all the following rules before booking 2. We need govt ID of all people we host. 3. Please follow no alcohol, no shoes, no smoking and no visitor policy. 4. Please ensure that your belongings are in your room. 5. In case of stays more than 2 days, please allow us/our maid access to water the plants in the balcony. 6. Please note that we are not giving towels,soaps due to COVID situation 7. Please note that hall and kitchen is shared space, the other bedroom is our painting and music studio wherein we frequent in the afternoon and nights. also Varun is a musician and he practises at night! 8. While you check out, please keep the garbage out (separately wet and dry in different bags, before 10 am) and keep the key on the round table in hall and drop us a message. 9. title: Casa Symphony-Spacious Studio in Baner-Pashan
description: Just 3.5 kms from Balewadi High Street. 800 mtrs to Mumbai-Bangalore Highway. Imagine starting your day with the peaceful sounds of nature‚Äîthe call of peacocks, the rustling of leaves, and a stunning view of Baner Hills and Pashan Hill Lake, all from your bed. Welcome to Casa Symphony, a spacious studio apartment that feels like a home away from home. This isn‚Äôt just a place to stay; it‚Äôs a space designed to help you unwind, recharge, and get inspired. The space Located just a short drive from major corporate offices, Casa Symphony is perfect for business travelers who want to balance work and relaxation. After a productive day, come back to a sanctuary where nature‚Äôs calm will take care of your evening. Our spacious studio apartment (single room with an attached washroom and an open kitchenette) comfortably fits up to four guests, making it ideal for solo travelers, small groups, or families. The queen-size bed with nature-inspired bedding ensures you get a restful night‚Äôs sleep, while the cozy sofa-cum-bed and vibrant boho rug invite you to relax and enjoy your favorite shows on the 43" Smart TV. Last Minute Emails? We have your back. The work cum dining table, with a beautiful view of the Sahyadri hills, offers a peaceful spot to focus and stay inspired. With high-speed Wi-Fi throughout the studio, you can stay connected and get things done, all while enjoying the slow pace of life here. When it‚Äôs time to unwind, you‚Äôll love our Artist's Corner - a favorite among guests. This cozy nook offers a perfect spot to relax with a book or simply soak in the view of Baner Hills. You might even spot a peacock or two! We‚Äôve also provided some art supplies, just in case inspiration strikes. Feeling hungry? The well-equipped kitchenette has everything you need to prepare a meal, including an induction stove, electric kettle, water purifier, and all the essential cookware and cutlery. Whether you‚Äôre whipping up a quick breakfast or a special dinner, you‚Äôll find everything you need right here. If you‚Äôre in the mood to explore, the nearby trails of Baner and Pashan Hills offer a great way to connect with nature. And when you‚Äôre ready to venture out, you‚Äôll find some of the city‚Äôs best cafes, cultural spots, and shopping areas just a short drive away. Casa Symphony is more than just a place to stay. It‚Äôs a retreat where you can relax, recharge, and feel at home. Whether you‚Äôre here for work or leisure, you‚Äôll find everything you need to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. Guest access The entire studio apartment is privately available to you with self-checkin. Sit & read in our communal seating lounge or catch mesmerizing sunsets from our rooftop terrace, the perfect spots to relax and connect with fellow-travelers. Other things to note Casa Symphony is a spacious studio apartment (a single room with large French windows) with a queen bed and a queen sofa bed. 1. Gated Community 2. Convenient door-step delivery services from Swiggy, Instamart, Zomato, etc. 3. Tea, Coffee - Ready Open kitchenette. 4. Couple-Friendly. We welcome couples if you both are 21+ years. 5. Please note that we need you to share images of Photo ID & Address proofs (Aadhar card/Driving License - front and back both) for all the guests before your check-in. 6. We provide only handwash in the washroom and no other toiletries due to guests‚Äô individual preferences. Request you to carry your own. 7. NO SMOKING, NO DRINKING, NO LOUD MUSIC AFTER 9 PM. NO PARTIES/EVRNTS OR ANY DECORATION Any violation will attract penalties. Thank You. Keep Smiling :)

title: The Decked-Out Container Home
description: Seeking an urban escape without the journey? Immerse yourself in our chic container home, featuring an alluring outdoor deck with a hot tub, cozy fireplace, and projector for starlit cinema. Drift into tranquility on our hanging bed, suspended in a peaceful embrace. This urban escape merges eco-luxury with the comfort of home, inviting you to a unique retreat where cherished memories await. Come, unwind and elevate your getaway under the open sky. And we've still not spoken of what's inside.. The space (NOTE : The Indoor bath tub is included when you book for 2 people. The outdoor Jacuzzi is included when you book for 4-6 people. Incase you want to use the Outdoor Jacuzzi in the price of a 2 person booking, it costs an additional 2.5k) Step into an enclave where warmth meets water‚Äîa fireplace greets you alongside the sound of a waterfall, leading you to a sheltered deck. Here, luxuriate in a 2-6 person Jacuzzi, revel in outdoor films with our projector, lounge on a swaying hanging bed, or clink glasses at the bar table, crafting unforgettable evenings amongst friends. The heart of our container home unfolds into a cozy living room arrayed with a plush sofa (doubling as an extra sleeping spot), a coffee bar boasting an instant coffee machine, and an indoor projector complemented by a top-notch home theater system‚Äîguitar included for the musically inclined. Adjacent to the living area, discover the culinary allure of a fully-equipped kitchen, a bunk bed room imbued with ambience lighting, and a washroom stocked with necessities. The sanctuary of the master bedroom awaits with a king-size bed, a dedicated workspace, and a round hot tub nestled amidst lush plants, alongside its own private bathroom. Each bedroom, from the master to the charming bunk bed room, is a haven with mood lighting, outfitted with both a fan and AC for maximum comfort. Ensuring ease of access for guests of all ages, our bunk bed design is thoughtful and accommodating. Attention to detail extends to the essentials‚Äîthe common and en-suite bathrooms provide hot water, shampoo, body wash, lotion, and towels for a carefree stay. Finally, capture the essence of your gathering with our handcrafted moon wall‚Äîa backdrop for those special group snapshots, solidifying your delightful escape within our home's one-of-a-kind embrace. Facilities : ‚òÖ Round the clock security ‚òÖ High speed WIFI ‚òÖ Inverter ‚òÖ Caretaker on site ‚òÖ Hot tub ‚òÖ Outdoor Jacuzzi (Additional charges) ‚òÖ Indoor + Outdoor Projectors ‚òÖ Dedicated Fireplace ‚òÖ BBQ Grill ‚òÖ Waterfall feature ‚òÖ Bathrooms with modern amenities ‚òÖ Outdoor Deck ‚òÖ Waste removal on daily basis ‚òÖ Daily cleaning service ‚òÖ Home Delivery available for everything (Liqour + Medicines + Groceries + Food) Guest access Guests have access to the entire property. Parking is available inside the society. There are 2 bathtubs, one of them is a jacuzzi that is placed on the outer deck (4 person jacuzzi) and the other is a 2 person bath tub that's inside the master bedroom. With a 2 person booking you get the 2 person bathtub and with a 4+ person booking you get the 4 person jacuzzi. Other things to note Essentials and indulgences are within an arm's reach of our property, boasting a liquor shop, pharmacy, general store, and an array of food and beverage establishments‚Äîall just a short stroll away. Additionally, local restaurants offer late-night delivery, ensuring your stay is the epitome of convenience and comfort.

title: Peaceful room in a lovely terraced home
description: My place is close to the Pune - Airport (7 Kms), Railway & Bus Station (3.5 Kms). Located in Koregaon Park 100 meters from German Bakery and less than 500 meters from Osho International. Our place is great for couples, solo travelers, business travelers, interns, meditators and students of yoga and ayurveda. It is a warm and welcoming space in a great neighborhood with close proximity to parks, art, culture, restaurants etc.. The space It is a spacious and beautiful 6 bedroom, house with a huge terrace. All rooms are self contained, private and with an attached bathroom. Guest access Guests can access the kitchen, living room, the terrace, refrigerator, washing machine and Wifi Internet (available only in living room). Basically you can access the entire property with the exception of our private rooms and other guest rooms (3 guest rooms in all). The terrace is an amazing place to sit in the mornings or evenings and just enjoy the weather. During your stay Would love to interact with guests and support them for whatever they might need to make their stay comfortable and memorable. Interaction totally depends on the guest. If you would like silence and space that is perfectly great as well. Other things to note A few points I would like to share which maybe helpful for you to know. - We have a duplex flat with the entrance and terrace garden on the 3rd floor and private rooms on the 2nd floor. The pictures of the terrace you see in the profile are from the 3rd floor. The terrace is a common area. Your private room is on the second floor. - Access to the rooms is only through the flat and every time one needs to access or leave the room one will have to climb or descend a flight of 15 steps. - We have a pet dog, Ommi, who is very loving and peaceful. He has now become a senior dog at 14 years old, he tends to bark a bit more as he is not able to see that well anymore. But if you just stand still and allow him to sniff you, he will lose interest and become calm again. We also have a pet cat Shanti who is always around too. If you are not comfortable with pets and animals in general, you might want to consider if this is the right place for you to stay. If you are an animal lover you will feel right at home. - We are located on North Main road, Koregaon Park. It is quite a busy road. Even though the rooms are not directly road facing some road noise does come through. This is not so much of a problem but incase anyone is a light sleeper it may be an issue. - it is a non AC room. The room tends to remain cool as it is on the 2 nd floor and does not get direct sunlight for more than a few hours a day. - Check in time is after 1 pm and check out time is by 11 am. - We will need id and address proof soft copies from all guests coming to stay. This can be shared via this same chat after booking and before arrival. - The kitchen is only one for the whole house. For guests it is only available for light cooking of snacks reheating of food and making tea and coffee. - We only allow registered guests to stay. No other visitors are allowed.
